text: @News24 @QaanitahHunter @PresidencyZA and @CyrilRamaphosa the health risks associated with drinking and smoking have been well known and documented long before COVID-19 and Lockdown started. They will continue beyond level 3/2/1 and Covid-19 itself. So what is your minister’s real agenda here?
